content.legion: Chance to recover %Max MP while attacking (10s cd)

innerAbility.name: 1st Line Options
abilities: Attack Speed +1 (For Regions w/ AS10 Cap)

innerAbility.name: 2nd & 3rd Line Options
abilities: Chance to Skip Cooldown +10% (if not 1st line)

attackStats.name: Attack Speed
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Stage 4}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/agile-magic.png} tip={Agile Magic (2nd Job)} val={+2}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/return-dive.png} tip={Return Dive (3rd Job)} val={+1}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/inherited-will.png} tip={Inherited Will (Beginner Skill)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/agile-magic.png} tip={Agile Magic (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/high-wisdom.png} tip={High Wisdom (2nd Job)} val={+40}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/freuds-wisdom.png} tip={Freud's Wisdom (5th Job)} val={+55}> <bg type={def} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP} subSrc={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} subTip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} subVal={extra +400%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-fury.png} tip={Dragon Fury (4th Job)} val={+30%}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/inherited-will.png} tip={Inherited Will (Beginner Skill)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-link.png} tip={Magic Link (1st Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/spell-mastery.png} tip={Spell Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/blessing-of-the-onyx.png} tip={Blessing of the Onyx (4th Job)} val={+55}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-mastery.png} tip={Magic Mastery (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/spiral-of-mana.png} tip={Spiral of Mana - Passive (5th Job)} val={+35}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/freuds-wisdom.png} tip={Freud's Wisdom (5th Job)} val={+25}>

attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/critical-magic.png} tip={Critical Magic (3rd Job)} val={+30%}> <bg type={def} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/spell-mastery.png} tip={Spell Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+15% & +5% when wand is equipped}>

attackStats.name: Crit Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/critical-magic.png} tip={Critical Magic (3rd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-mastery.png} tip={Magic Mastery (4th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/heroic-memories.png} tip={Heroic Memories (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/partners.png} tip={Partners (2nd Job)} val={+20% while Mir is attacking}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Boss Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/high-dragon-potential.png} tip={High Dragon Potential (4th Job)} val={+20%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/freuds-wisdom.png} tip={Freud's Wisdom (5th Job)} val={+25%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/elemental-decrease.png} tip={Elemental Decrease - Final Damage (3rd Job)} val={+17%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-amplification.png} tip={Magic Amplification (3rd Job)} val={+30%}> × <bg type={debuff} src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/return-flash.png} tip={Return Flash (2nd Job)} val={+10%}> × <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/elemental-barrage.png} tip={Elemental Barrage (5th Job)} val={+5% per element cycled} val={(Max. +20%)}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/mana-overload.png} tip={Mana Overload (5th Job)} val={+8% while toggled}>

buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/heroic-memories.png} tip={Heroic Memories (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/freuds-wisdom.png} tip={Freud's Wisdom (5th Job)} dur={[30s per stack](240s cd, 25s cd between each stack)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[45s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} dur={[2400s](300s cd)}>
buffInfo.iFrame: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-master.png} tip={Dragon Master (Hyper Skill)} dur={[Up to 10s & 1s after skill end](240 - 80s cd based on remaining duration)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/freuds-wisdom.png} tip={Freud's Wisdom (5th Job)} dur={[30s](240s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/ethereal-form.png} tip={Ethereal Form (5th Job)} dur={[3s](60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/zodiac-burst.png} tip={Zodiac Burst (6th Job)} dur={(360s cd)}>

build: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-guard.png} tip={Magic Guard}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/teleport.png} tip={Teleport}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-spark.png} tip={Dragon Spark}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-soul.png} tip={Dragon Soul}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-link.png} tip={Magic Link}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/mana-burst-i.png} tip={Mana Burst I}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/high-wisdom.png} tip={High Wisdom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/wind-jump.png} tip={Wind Jump}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/spell-mastery.png} tip={Spell Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/agile-magic.png} tip={Agile Magic}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/mana-burst-ii.png} tip={Mana Burst II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-flash.png} tip={Dragon Flash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/wind-circle.png} tip={Wind Circle}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-amplification.png} tip={Magic Amplification}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-resistance.png} tip={Magic Resistance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/critical-magic.png} tip={Critical Magic}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/elemental-decrease.png} tip={Elemental Decrease}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-potential.png} tip={Dragon Potential}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/mana-burst-iii.png} tip={Mana Burst III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-dive.png} tip={Dragon Dive}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/thunder-circle.png} tip={Thunder Circle}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-debris.png} tip={Magic Debris}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dark-fog.png} tip={Dark Fog}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-mastery.png} tip={Magic Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-fury.png} tip={Dragon Fury}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/onyx-will.png} tip={Onyx Will}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/high-dragon-potential.png} tip={High Dragon Potential}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/blessing-of-the-onyx.png} tip={Blessing of the Onyx}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/mana-burst-iv.png} tip={Mana Burst IV}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-breath.png} tip={Dragon Breath}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/earth-circle.png} tip={Earth Circle}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/enhanced-magic-debris.png} tip={Enhanced Magic Debris}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: [For Both]<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/speedy-dragon-flash.png} tip={Speedy Dragon Flash}> Speedy Dragon Flash_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/speedy-dragon-dive.png} tip={Speedy Dragon Dive}> Speedy Dragon Dive_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/speedy-dragon-breath.png} tip={Speedy Dragon Breath}> Speedy Dragon Breath_>[For Bossing]<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/rolling-thunder.png} tip={Rolling Thunder}> Rolling Thunder_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/earth-shattering-dive.png} tip={Earth-Shattering Dive}> Earth-Shattering Dive_>[For Training]<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/howling-wind.png} tip={Howling Wind}> Howling Wind_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/lungs-of-stone.png} tip={Lungs of Stone}> Lungs of Stone_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/wind-circle.png} tip={Wind Circle, Wind Flash, and Wind Breath (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/earth-circle.png} tip={Earth Circle, Earth Breath, and Earth Dive (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/thunder-circle.png} tip={Thunder Circle, Thunder Flash, and Thunder Dive (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/mana-burst-i.png} tip={Mana Burst (1st - 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-breath.png} tip={Dragon Breath and Return Flame (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-flash.png} tip={Dragon Flash (2nd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-spark.png} tip={Dragon Spark (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-dive.png} tip={Dragon Dive (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-debris.png} tip={Magic Debris (3rd Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/mana-burst-i.png} tip={Mana Burst (1st - 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-spark.png} tip={Dragon Spark (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/wind-circle.png} tip={Wind Circle, Wind Flash, and Wind Breath (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-flash.png} tip={Dragon Flash (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/thunder-circle.png} tip={Thunder Circle, Thunder Flash, and Thunder Dive (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-dive.png} tip={Dragon Dive (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/magic-debris.png} tip={Magic Debris (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/earth-circle.png} tip={Earth Circle, Earth Breath, and Earth Dive (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-breath.png} tip={Dragon Breath and Return Flame (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dark-fog.png} tip={Dark Fog (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-master.png} tip={Dragon Master (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/summon-onyx-dragon.png} tip={Summon Onyx Dragon (Hyper Skill)}>

credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build + Infographic

extraContent.title: Fusion Skills
content: Fusion Skills are passive attacks that trigger whenever you combine your attack with Mir's attack. Additionally, Mir's Skills and Fusion Attacks are not affected by Attack Speed increases and will not trigger Damage Reflect.
Below is a list of skills that will trigger Fusion Skills:
<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-flash.png} tip={Dragon Flash (2nd Job)}> Dragon Flash (2nd Job) +

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/wind-circle.png} tip={Wind Circle (2nd Job)}> Wind Circle (2nd Job) = <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/wind-flash.png} tip={Wind Flash (2nd Job)}> Wind Slash (2nd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/thunder-circle.png} tip={Thunder Circle (3rd Job)}> Thunder Circle (3rd Job) = <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/thunder-flash.png} tip={Thunder Flash (3rd Job)}> Thunder Flash (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/return.png} tip={Return! (2nd Job)}> Return! effect: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/return-flash.png} tip={Return Flash (2nd Job)}> Return Flash (2nd Job)_>
<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-dive.png} tip={Dragon Dive (3rd Job)}> Dragon Dive (3rd Job) +

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/thunder-circle.png} tip={Thunder Circle (3rd Job)}> Thunder Circle (3rd Job) = <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/thunder-dive.png} tip={Thunder Dive (3rd Job)}> Thunder Dive (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/earth-circle.png} tip={Earth Circle (4th Job)}> Earth Circle (4th Job) = <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/earth-dive.png} tip={Earth Dive (4th Job)}> Earth Dive (4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/return.png} tip={Return! (2nd Job)}}> Return! effect: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/return-dive.png} tip={Return Dive (3rd Job)}> Return Dive (3rd Job)_>
<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-breath.png} tip={Dragon Breath (4th Job)}> Dragon Breath (4th Job) +

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/wind-circle.png} tip={Wind Circle (2nd Job)}> Wind Circle (2nd Job) = <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/earth-circle.png} tip={Wind Breath (4th Job)}> Wind Breath (4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/earth-circle.png} tip={Earth Circle (4th Job)}> Earth Circle (4th Job) = <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/earth-breath.png} tip={Earth Breath (4th Job)}> Earth Breath (4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/return.png} tip={Return! (2nd Job)}> Return! effect: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/return-dive.png} tip={Return Flame (4th Job)}> Return Flame (4th Job)_>
<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-slam.png} tip={Dragon Slam (5th Job)}> Dragon Slam (5th Job) +

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/elemental-barrage.png} tip={Elemental Barrage (5th Job)}> Elemental Barrage (5th Job) = <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/wyrmkings-breath.png} tip={Wyrmking's Breath (5th Job)}> Wyrmking's Breath (5th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/return.png} tip={Return! (2nd Job)}> Return! effect: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/ludicrous-speed.png} tip={Ludicrous Speed (5th Job)}> Ludicrous Speed (5th Job)_>

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Inherited Will
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Magic ATT by 10 and All Stats by 10

primary.name: Back to Nature
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Moves you to your Front Yard.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/7/Hero%27s_Succession} title={"Hero's Succession"}>

primary.name: Mana Burst I
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Creates a burst of magic in front of you

primary.name: Teleport
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Teleport Horizontal Range: 275, Teleport Vertical Range: 320
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage Taken (while active): -10%, Damage Displaced: 85% of your MP

primary.name: Dragon Soul
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases DEF by 145 and Speed by 22, and Max Speed by 20.\nMP Absorb Chance: 15%, Amount Absorbed: 5% of Max MP, Amount Absorbed: 3% of the boss's Max MP
primary.desc: Grants DEF, Movement Speed, and a chance for attacks to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP

primary.name: Magic Link
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Max MP: +20%, MP increases by 120 per level, Magic ATT: +20

primary.name: Dragon Spark
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Chance: 40%, Damage: 100%
primary.desc: Whenever you attack, Mir has a chance to deal an additional attack as well

primary.name: Mana Burst II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 130%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 5
details: Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit

primary.name: Wind Circle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40. Knocks back up to 6 enemies, dealing 108% damage 5 times\nCasting Wind Circle after a Mir skill will instead trigger a fusion skill. Casting Mana Burst before Wind Circle, or casting Wind Circle while lying down, will not prevent the fusion skill from triggering. However, MP cost will be multiplied by 3.
primary.desc: Creates a gust of wind that pushes enemies

primary.name: Dragon Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Damage: 95%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Duration: 3.5 sec\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Mir dashes back and forth damaging enemies that pass through

primary.name: Wind Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 55%, Number of Attacks: 2, Number of Wind Blades: 3, Duration: 3.5 sec\nNormal Enemy Damage: +75% points\nWhen many wind blades hit 1 enemy, final damage of wind blade is reduced by 35%
primary.desc: Mir creates blades of wind that seek and attack nearby enemies
details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-flash.png} tip={Dragon Flash (2nd Job)}>
Deals increased %Damage to Regular Monsters by a flat amount

primary.name: Return Flash
primary.shortDesc: Max Monsters Cursed: 8, amplifies Final Damage of magic attack skills by 10%, Duration 60 sec
primary.desc: Debuffs nearby enemies
details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-flash.png} tip={Dragon Flash (2nd Job)}>
[Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from magic attacks

primary.name: Return!
primary.shortDesc: Immediately calls Mir, mid-fight.
primary.desc: Mir will immediately return to you if Mir is actively attacking
details: Grants a special effect depending on what skill Mir was using

primary.name: Agile Magic
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, INT: +20

primary.name: Wind Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, jump in mid-air to go farther.\nCan teleport once without a platform before landing.
primary.desc: Jumps upwards
details: Can be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air
After using the skill, you can cast <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/teleport.png} tip={Teleport (1st Job)}> once before landing

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: INT: +40

primary.name: Partners
primary.shortDesc: When using Mir skills, Duration: 5 sec, Evan's Damage: +20%\n[Passive Effect: Knockback Resistance +30%]

primary.name: Spell Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +50%, Critical Rate: +15%, Magic ATT: +10, Critical Rate (wand equipped): 5%

primary.name: Advanced Dragon Spark
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Chance: 100%, Damage: 150%

primary.name: Mana Burst III
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 37, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 6
details: Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit

primary.name: Thunder Circle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 48, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 5\nCasting Thunder Circle after a Mir skill will instead trigger a fusion skill. Casting Mana Burst before Thunder Circle, or casting Thunder Circle while lying down, will not prevent the fusion skill from triggering. However, MP cost will be multiplied by 3.
primary.desc: Creates a spark of lightning around your character

primary.name: Dragon Dive
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 130%, Number of Attacks: 3, Duration: 3.5 sec
Cooldown: 8 sec
[Wind Circle] Damage: +62% points
[Dragon Flash] Damage: +50% points
[Wind Flash] Damage: +30% points
[Thunder Flash] Damage: +150% points
primary.desc: Mir dives to the ground and creates a shockwave around themselves
details: [Passive]: Increases %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/wind-circle.png} tip={Wind Cirlce (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-flash.png} tip={Dragon Flash (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/wind-flash.png} tip={Wind Flash (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/thunder-flash.png} tip={Thunder Flash (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Thunder Dive
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 135%, Number of Attacks: 1, Number of Orbs: 4, Duration: 9 sec, Orbs disappear after hitting enemies or after a set time
primary.desc: Dragon Dive now instead creates orbs of lightning that damages enemies
details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-dive.png} tip={Dragon Dive (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Return Dive
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 60 sec, Attack Speed of you and nearby party members: +1
primary.desc: Grants nearby party members increased Attack Speed (by 1 stage)
details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-dive.png} tip={Dragon Dive (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Thunder Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Damage (per Crash): 400%, Number of Attacks: 9, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nFinal Damage of crash decreases by 60% every time the same enemy is attacked repeatedly
primary.desc: Mir dashes multiple times in the shape of a star
details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-flash.png} tip={Dragon Flash (2nd Job)}>
Enemies attacked repeatedly take reduced %Final Damage from the attack

primary.name: Magic Debris
primary.shortDesc: Amount of Debris Created: 1, Debris Formation Cooldown: 0.6 sec, Maximum Debris Limit: 15, MP Cost: 100, Maximum Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 70%, Number of Hits: 1, Damage: +40% points (for every 5 debris), unactivated debris disappears after a set time
primary.desc: Enemies hit by Fusion Skills will create magic debris
details: Pressing the Skill Key will cause the magic debris to seek and attack nearby enemies
Unused magic debris will disappear over time

primary.name: Elemental Decrease
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 53, Elemental Attribute Resistance: -10%, Duration: 180 sec\n[Passive : Final damage +17%]

primary.name: Critical Magic

primary.name: Magic Amplification

primary.name: Dragon Potential

primary.name: Earth Circle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 58, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 5\nCasting Earth Circle after a Mir skill will instead trigger a fusion skill. Casting Mana Burst before Earth Circle, or casting Earth Circle while lying down, will not prevent the fusion skill from triggering. However, MP cost will be multiplied by 3.
primary.desc: Launches earth from beneath in front of you

primary.name: Dragon Breath
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 5, Duration: 3 sec
Cooldown: 10 sec
[Wind Circle] Damage: +212% points
[Dragon Flash] Damage: +320% points
[Wind Flash] Damage: +160% points
[Thunder Flash] Damage: +745% points
[Thunder Circle] Damage: +150% points
[Dragon Dive] Damage: +195% points
[Thunder Dive] Damage: +210% points
[Earth Dive] Damage: +620% points

primary.name: Wind Breath

primary.name: Earth Breath

primary.name: Earth Dive
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Forms rocks and 3 Crashes, Damage (per crash): 370%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nFinal Damage of crash decreases by 50% every time the same enemy is attacked repeatedly.

details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-flash.png} tip={Dragon Flash (2nd Job)}>
Enemies attacked repeatedly take reduced %Final Damage from the attack

primary.name: Dark Fog

primary.name: Maple Warrior

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Enhanced Magic Debris
primary.shortDesc: Amount of Debris Created: 1, Debris Formation Cooldown: 0.4 sec, Maximum Debris Limit: 15, MP Cost: 140, Maximum Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 120%, Number of Hits: 1, Damage: +100% points (for every 5 debris), unactivated debris disappears after a set time
details: Increases %p Damage and maximum number of debris
Reduces the cooldown between each debris created

primary.name: Magic Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +70%. Magic ATT: +30, Critical Damage: +20%
details: Now grants flat Magic Attack and increases %Crit Damage

hyperPassive.name: Cyclone Breath

hyperActive.name: Summon Onyx Dragon
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 600, Duration: 40 sec, Damage: 550%, Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 2, Abnormal Status Resistance (while Onyx Dragon is present): +80\nCooldown: 80 sec
hyperActive.desc: Summons a dragon that attacks nearby enemies
details: Increases Abnormal Status Resistance while Onyx Dragon is present

hyperActive.name: Dragon Master
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 10%, Mount Duration: 10 sec, Invincible while mounted
Duration: 0.3 sec. Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 7
When skill ends, invincible for 1 sec. Reduces cooldown by 18 sec for every 1 sec of the remaining key-down time, can be reduced as much as 160 sec
Cooldown: 240 sec
hyperActive.desc: Mounts onto Mir and allows you to freely fly around and unleash a breath of fire
details: Holding the Skill Key will blast a breath of fire forward<bp_Releasing the Skill Key will immediately dismount Mir and end the skill_>
For each remaining 1 sec key-down time, the skill cooldown is reduced by 18 sec (up to 160 sec)
You are invincible while mounted and briefly after the skill ends

hyperActive.name: Heroic Memories
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Hero class in the party

fifthMain.name: Elemental Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, uses magic 4 times in a row, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1705%, Number of Attacks: 8, Critical Rate: +100%
Each element increases Final Damage by 5% for 10 sec
Cooldown: 60 sec
Casting Elemental Barrage after a Mir skill will instead trigger a fusion skill. Casting Elemental Barrage while lying down will not prevent the fusion skill from triggering. However, MP cost will be multiplied by 5.
fifthMain.desc: Unleash an elemental attack in front of you
details: For each successful element attack (4 elements), gain a stacking %Final Damage buff

While Mir is casting <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-slam.png} tip={Dragon Slam (5th Job)}>, pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will cast the Fusion Skill with increased MP cost without activating this attack
Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Dragon Slam
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Damage: 1540%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Duration: 2.5 sec\nCooldown: 20 sec
fifthMain.desc: Mir dives to the ground and creates a shockwave around themselves

fifthMain.name: Wyrmking's Breath
fifthMain.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1320%, Number of Attacks: 7, Duration: 4 sec
fifthMain.desc: Mir unleashes a powerful blast of elemental energy
details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-slam.png} tip={Dragon Slam (5th Job)}> and you get both skills together

fifthMain.name: Ludicrous Speed
fifthMain.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 330%, Number of Attacks: 3, Duration: 5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a damaging vortex at your location
details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/dragon-slam.png} tip={Dragon Slam (5th Job)}> and you get both skills together

fifthMain.name: Elemental Radiance
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, sets up a magic pentacle for 12 sec. Liberation starts when Magic ATT reaches 25, Duration: 12 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1045%, Number of Attacks: 8 times consecutively, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%\n3 Magic ATT will be charged if a skill with an attribute hits a target, but it will only be charged once per skill. Charges 1 Magic ATT when a skill with no attribute hits a target, and there is no charge limit\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Create a magical pentacle that charges up as you attack enemies
details: Successful attacks will charge the pentacle (max 25)<bp_Skills with an attribute grant 3 charges but can only charge once per pentacle cast_Skills with no attribute grant 1 charge_>
Upon reaching max charges, release a blast of elemental energy

fifthMain.name: Spiral of Mana
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 240, Duration: 7 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Number of Attacks: 16\n[Passive Effect: Magic ATT: +35]
fifthMain.desc: Summon a magic circle that continuously fires a barrage of magic forward
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF a function to activate the skill by pressing Down Arrow Key and <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/evan/mana-burst-i.png} tip={Mana Burst I (1st Job)}> together only if it hits an enemy

meta: Evan is an INT mage class part of the Heroes class group. What is unique about Evan is that he has a dragon that fights alongside you. Your dragon, Mir can attack on its own independant of your attacks. You can combine your attacks together to create a fusion attack
